column4: hey everyone, installed the desktop for the first time today. Can someone help explain how to auto mount my partitions? Is there a filemanager that does this automatically? (I am using gnome.
edit your fstab to get that going

Just incase you don't know how to tell which partitions are which, you can use sudo fdisk -l (that's a lowercase 'L') to figure out which partitions are which and then edit your fstab file accordingly
